'''Quiet Elegance''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Sakura Tempura]] with [[Kamisato Ayato]]. The [[recipe]] for [[Sakura Tempura]] is obtainable from the World Quest [[Gourmet Supremos, Assemble!]]

Quiet Elegance increases all party members' [[Shield]] Strength by '''35'''% for 300s. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
